headline: How Investors May Respond To Hasbro (HAS) Pivot Toward High-Margin Wizards And Digital Gaming Profit Growth
summary: In recent weeks, Hasbro’s Wizards of the Coast and digital gaming businesses have delivered strong revenue growth and now generate over 80% of the company’s operating profit, prompting the company to raise its full-year outlook after an 8% year-over-year revenue increase in Q3 2025 and a 42% surge in Wizards and Digital Gaming revenue. This shift, highlighted by analysts as the market underestimating Hasbro’s transformation away from traditional toys toward higher-margin games and...
